locations.name: Bangkok
locations.description: Thailand's vibrant capital city, known for its ornate temples, bustling canals, lively markets, and diverse culinary scene.

locations.name: Koh Yao Noi
locations.description: A tranquil island nestled in Phang Nga Bay, offering seclusion, stunning karst vistas, spa experiences, and exploration of nearby islets.

locations.name: Krabi
locations.description: A coastal province famous for its dramatic limestone cliffs, turquoise waters, pristine beaches (like Railay), island hopping, and kayaking opportunities.
